name: Driving Army Car Offroad
description:
Driving Army Car Offroad!!!
Drive to explore off-road environment and test your driving skills. If you want to became a truck driver and this is imposibble for some reason for you you have to try this game.
Game Features
-Steering wheel, buttons or tilting controls
-Wonderful sound
-Fanstanstic landscapes
-Free to play in google
-HD graphics
-Smooth and easy controls
